dublin_core.dcvalue: Amanda Puckett BenDor, Technical Advisor, IntraHealth, apuckett@intrahealth.org
Guinea, Liberia, Mali, Senegal, Sierra Leone, Tanzania

mHero is a two-way, mobile phone-based communication platform that uses basic text messaging, or SMS, to connect ministries of health and health workers. mHero operates on simple talk-and-text mobile devicesâ€”no smartphone or tablet required.
